question: What is ‘2MASS 1155-7919 b’, which was recently discovered by the scientists at the Rochester Institute of Technology?
explanation:
Scientists at the Rochester Institute of Technology Scientists recently discovered an exo-planet, which is closer to Earth than any other planet. The newly discovered planet named ‘2MASS 1155-7919 b’ is only 330 light years away from the earth.
It is spotted by the scientists beyond our solar system and the findings were published in Research Notes of the American Astronomical Society.
